parameters.name: HashKeyList
parameters.description: The identifiers of files. Only MD5 hash values are supported.

parameters.name: SourceIp
parameters.description: The source IP address of the request.

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description:
The type of the file. Valid values:

*   **0**: unknown file
*   **1**: binary file
*   **2**: webshell file
*   **4**: script file

> If you do not know the type of the file, set this parameter to 0.
